hooks.command: jq -r '.tool_input.file_path' | { read file_path; if echo "$file_path" | grep -q '\.ts$'; then "$HOME/Applications/PyCharm Professional Edition.app/Contents/bin/format.sh" -allowDefaults "$file_path"; fi; }
